product_name: Imagine Surf Surfer Stand Up Paddleboard - 9' 9"
long_description: Durable, stable and welcoming to any skill level, the Surfer Stand Up Paddleboard from Imagine Surf is at home in flatwater, surf, oceans, lakes and slow-moving rivers. Polyethylene formed with a blow-molding process allows the use of 20% post-consumer recycled content and forms a completely recyclable product. Tough, family-friendly construction means you can lend it out to the kids and their friends and not worry about scratches and dings. Full deck EVA pad; lockable pass-through front handle; side and tail handles; front bungee; snap-in 9 in. fin. 48 lb. weight; 34 in. width.
short_description: Durable, stable and welcoming to any skill level, the Surfer Stand Up Paddleboard from Imagine Surf is at home in flatwater, surf, oceans, lakes and slow-moving rivers.
